name: Lavalval Chain
desc:
2 Level 4 monsters
Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card to activate 1 of these effects;
● Send 1 card from your Deck to the Graveyard.
● Choose 1 monster from your Deck and place it on top of your Deck.
str2: Send 1 card from your Deck to the Graveyard.
str3: Choose 1 Monster Card from your Deck and put it on top of your Deck.
str4: Choose monster to put on top of your Deck
